description: Ashneer Grover’s Rise and Fall debuts on Amazon MX Player on September 6, 2025. The reality show brings intense competition, strategic challenges, and Grover’s fiery personality to the screen. Here is all you need to know about its OTT debut.
title: Ashneer Grover’s Rise and Fall to Premiere on OTT Soon: All the Details

description: At its Demo Store in Berlin, Germany, Dyson on Thursday unveiled a wide range of new products. Founder and Chair James Dyson introduced the lineup, which includes vacuum and floor cleaners, hair dryers, air purifiers, heaters, bladeless fans, and other haircare devices. Among the highlights was the Dyson PencilVac, a vacuum with a 38mm diameter handle that is set to arrive in select markets later this year.
title: Dyson PencilVac Unveiled Alongside 10 New Floor Cleaners, Air Purifiers and Hair Dryers at IFA 2025

description: RRI’s PRATUSH—a credit-card-sized computer payload—will detect faint radio signals from hydrogen to study the “Cosmic Dawn”. Designed for deployment on the Moon’s far side, the system offers noise-free, efficient data handling using an SBC and FPGA combo. If successful, it could help determine when the first stars formed and expand our cosmic understanding.
title: India’s PRATUSH Computer Could Detect Signals From the Universe’s First Stars: Report

description: ISRO has successfully tested drogue parachutes for the Gaganyaan crew module at its Chandigarh facility. The rocket-sled trials simulated high-speed re-entry conditions, ensuring parachutes deploy and stabilize the capsule. This achievement marks a critical milestone as India prepares for its first crewed space mission, aiming to join the US, Russia, and China in human spaceflight.
title: ISRO Tests Parachutes for Gaganyaan Crew Module in Key Rocket-Sled Trial

description: A newly discovered asteroid, 2025 QV5, about the size of a school bus, will safely pass Earth today at a distance of 500,000 miles, roughly twice as far as the moon. NASA’s JPL notes it will not return this close again until September 2125. Scientists are tracking its path to refine orbital predictions and future flybys.
title: NASA Tracks Newly Discovered Bus-Sized Asteroid as It Flies Past Earth

description: On October 3, 2025, interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS will pass just 30 million km from Mars — nine times closer than from Earth. ESA’s Mars Express and TGO, along with NASA and China’s orbiters, will attempt to image its coma, analyze gases, and study this rare visitor from beyond the solar system.
title: NASA's Hubble Captures Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Ahead of Close Mars Flyby

description: Bun Butter Jam --- the new Tamil-language romantic-comedy depicts the clash between generations as the mothers want to bring their kids together, while the Gen Z kids like different things in life, leading to chaotic and funny events. The film starts streaming on OTT platforms soon.
title: Raju Jeyamohan-Starrer Bun Butter Jam to Stream on OTT Soon: Know When, Where to Watch Online

description: Huawei Mate XTs has been launched in China with a 6.4-inch cover display, a 7.9-inch dual-mode screen, and a 10.2-inch unfolded OLED LTPO panel with adaptive refresh and 1,440Hz PWM dimming. It runs on a Kirin 9020 SoC with 16GB RAM and HarmonyOS 5.1. The triple rear camera setup includes 50-megapixel, 40-megapixel, and 12-megapixel sensors with OIS, accompanied by an 8-megapixel front camera. The phone packs a 5,600mAh battery with 66W wired and 50W wireless charging.
title: Huawei Mate XTs Tri-Fold Smartphone Launched With Kirin 9020 Chip, 5,600mAh Battery

description: Shan Thulasidharan’s Kammattam, Zee5’s first Malayalam original series, is now streaming on OTTplay Premium and Zee5. Starring Sudev Nair as a police inspector, the thriller is inspired by real incidents from central Kerala. With suspense, drama, and crime at its core, it’s a must-watch for Malayalam web series fans.
title: Kammattam is Now Streaming on ZEE5: All You Need to Know

description: Kannappa, written and acted by Vishnu Manchu, is a Telugu-language devotional movie that is now streaming on Prime Video. The film explores themes of devotion, power, and Hinduism. It has a stellar star case, featuring  Akshay Kumar, Prabhas, Mohanlal, Kajal Aggarwal, R. Sarathkumar, and more.
title: Kannappa Now Streaming Online: Know When and Where to Watch This Vishnu Manchu-Starrer Online

description: On September 7–8, 2025, a total lunar eclipse will turn the Moon deep red for 82 minutes. Visible to 70–85% of Earth’s population, it will be the longest such event since 2022. Skywatchers in Asia, Africa, Australia, and parts of Europe will enjoy the full celestial show.
title: Lunar Eclipse September 2025: Know Who Will Get to See the Blood Moon on September 7

description: Astronomers using JWST and Hubble have discovered JWST’s Quintet, a system of at least five merging galaxies just 800 million years after the Big Bang. This rare find shows how galaxies grew rapidly in the early universe and may explain how some became inactive so soon.
title: NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope Spots Rare Quintet of Galaxies From the Early Universe

description: Projects in ChatGPT has been a premium feature ever since its release in December 2024. But, with an announcement on Wednesday, OpenAI has now expanded the feature to all users of the platform. Currently, it is only available via the website and the Android app, but the company has mentioned that iOS users will get access to it in the coming days.
title: OpenAI Expands Projects in ChatGPT to All Users, Adds New Memory Control Feature

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 is confirmed to start in September-end. During the sale, the company will offer several electronics, like smartphones, tablets, TWS, laptops, washing machines, refrigerators, and their accessories at discounted prices. Devices from various reputed brands, like Samsung, Asus, Dell, Apple, and Acer, will be available at a discounted price. Amazon’s Prime subscribers will be able to access the sale event before others.
title: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 Date Announced; Deals on Smartphones, Laptops From Samsung, Dell, Asus, and More Teased

description: Big Boss Telugu 9 follows a new format of two houses, with two groups of commoners and celebrities. It will be fun to watch if these houses are divided between these two, while it also follows the theme of Agnipariksha. Here's all you need to know about the Bigg Boss Telugu 9 OTT release.
title: Big Boss Telugu 9 OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Nagarjuna-Starring Show Online?

description: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 is scheduled to begin in September-end. The company updated the landing page for the sale event on its mobile to reveal the same. However, the duration of the Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 is currently unknown. Amazon has announced the commencement date of its Great Indian Festival Sale 2025.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025 Date Announced; Deals on iPhone 16, Samsung Galaxy S24 and More Teased

description: Google Pixel 6 series through Pixel 9 series is now getting the Material 3 Expressive design language. The Mountain View-based tech giant announced the expansion in a blog post on Wednesday, highlighting that the redesigned interface is being added via a new update. The update also brings the Adaptive Audio feature to the Pixel Buds Pro 2. Separately, the company also fixes bugs relating to the Pixel device’s battery health and fingerprint recognition.
title: Google's Material 3 Expressive Design Expands to More Pixel Devices, Battery Health Improves With September Pixel Drop

description: Sony is said to be planning to finally share an update on Marvel's Wolverine. According to a report, the game's new trailer is ready to be shown at a planned State of Play broadcast in September. The game is currently in development at Insomniac Games.
title: Marvel's Wolverine Will Reportedly Get a New Trailer at Sony's Next State of Play Event This Month

description: Oppo F31 series is expected to launch in India on September 12, with prices tipped under Rs. 20,000 for the F31, under Rs. 30,000 for the F31 Pro, and under Rs. 35,000 for the F31 Pro+. Leaked images show distinct rear camera designs and multiple colour options. The lineup may include a 7,000mAh battery, 80W SUPERVOOC charging, 50-megapixel main rear cameras, and 32-megapixel selfie shooters. The F31 Pro+ will likely be powered by the Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC.
title: Oppo F31 Series Price Range, India Launch Timeline, Colour Options Leaked; Said to Include 7,000mAh Battery

description: Oppo Reno 14 FS 5G has been launched as the latest addition to the company’s Reno 14 series. It has been introduced in select global markets, sporting a 6.57-inch AMOLED flexible screen with a 120Hz refresh rate and 1,400nits peak brightness. The handset is powered by Snapdragon 6s Gen 1 SoC and runs on ColorOS 15.  It gets IP68 + IP69 dust and water ingress protection ratings.
title: Oppo Reno 14 FS 5G Launched With Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 Chip, 6,000mAh Battery

description: From comedy talk shows to gripping thrillers and spine-chilling crime sequences, this week promises to be packed with high entertainment. Some of the top releases for the week include Maalik, Inspector Zende, and Aankhon Ki Gustaakhiyan.
title: OTT Releases of the Week (1st Sept - 7th Sept): From Maalik, to Inspector Zende, and More

description: Sony is reportedly planning to downgrade the SSD storage of the digital edition PS5 slim in Europe. The company will reduce the console' storage from 1TB to 825GB. The price of the digital edition PS5, however, will stay the same.
title: PS5 Digital Edition is Reportedly Getting Reduced SSD Storage in Europe

description: The Samsung Galaxy S25 FE arrives as the successor to the Galaxy S24 FE. It appears to be more of an iterative upgrade than a substantial one, sporting a thinner and lighter build than its predecessor. While it shares its design with the flagship Galaxy S25, there are several changes under the hood. Here are our first impressions of the Samsung Galaxy S25 FE.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE First Impressions

description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 series has been launched, and it introduces two models — Galaxy Tab S11 and Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra. Both tablets run on the latest Android 16-based One UI 8 firmware, with support for Galaxy AI features. They sport 120Hz AMOLED screens and come with an updated DeX software with enhanced functionalities, for an improved desktop experience.
title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11, Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra Launched With Dimensity 9400 SoC, Up to 14.6-Inch Displays

description: On Thursday, the Tecno Pova Slim 5G was launched in India. The smartphone is claimed to be the world’s slimmest with a thickness of 5.95mm. Despite its thin body, it packs a 5,160mAh battery. The company stated that the smartphone is also equipped with the Ella AI assistant that powers several on-device artificial intelligence (AI) features.
title: Tecno Pova Slim 5G Launched in India With 5.95mm Thin Profile, 6.78-Inch AMOLED Screen: Price, Features

description: Ukraine’s parliament has approved the first reading of a crypto legalisation bill that introduces an 18 percent tax on digital asset profits. Lawmakers believe the framework could help recover up to $10 billion (roughly Rs. 88,000 crore) lost to crypto crime while aligning with EU rules. The move signals Ukraine’s intent to integrate crypto into its financial system despite the ongoing war.
title: Ukraine’s Parliament Backs Draft Law to Legalise, Tax Crypto and Virtual Assets

description: Lava Yuva Smart 2 has been unveiled by the Indian smartphone maker in the country. The phone is powered by an octa-core Unisoc SoC, paired with a 5,000mAh battery pack. The entry-level handset is being offered in two colourways in India. The tech firm will offer free of charge doorstep service for its new handset.
title: Lava Yuva Smart 2 Debuts in India With a 5,000mAh Battery, 3GB RAM: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE has been launched and the latest Fan Edition smartphone from the company features a 6.7-inch full-HD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 1,900 nits brightness and Gorilla Glass Victus+ protection. Powered by the Exynos 2400 SoC with 8GB RAM, it ships with Android 16-based One UI 8, and promises seven years of updates. It includes AI features like Circle to Search and Gemini Live, a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit with 8K video recording, a 12-megapixel front camera, a 4,900mAh battery with 45W wired and 15W wireless charging.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Launched in India With Exynos 2400 SoC, 50-Megapixel Rear Camera: Price, Specifications

description: Siri is reportedly getting a new artificial intelligence (AI)-powered web search tool. According to the report, Apple is planning to add a Perplexity-style answer engine to its voice assistant, making it capable of answering more complex queries conversationally. The system is said to include three components, two of which could be powered by Google-developed AI models.
title: Apple Reportedly Plans AI Web Search Tool for Siri, Using Google’s AI Model for Responses

description: Bitcoin is consolidating around $110,400 (roughly ₹97.3 lakh) while Ethereum trades at $4,300 (roughly ₹3.8 lakh). Analysts credit ETF inflows, falling ETH reserves, and strong demand for supporting optimism, with traders watching if BTC can reclaim $113,000 or slide lower. Ethereum reclaiming $4,600 remains crucial to boost overall market sentiment and signal broader strength.
title: Ethereum Builds Momentum as Bitcoin Price Consolidates Above $110,000

description: Garmin Fenix 8 Pro has been launched in 47mm and 51mm AMOLED models, alongside a 51mm MicroLED variant. The AMOLED version is claimed to offer up to 27 days of battery life, while MicroLED is said to last for up to 10 days. The watch features LTE and satellite connectivity, Garmin Messenger support, LiveTrack, weather updates, and emergency services. It also packs performance, health, and navigation tools like endurance score, hill score, ECG app, sleep coach, Garmin Pay, and safety tracking, with 10ATM water resistance.
title: Garmin Fenix 8 Pro Launched in AMOLED and MicroLED Variants With LTE, Satellite Connectivity

description: Vivo X300 series leaks have been surfacing online for a while, hinting at the possible upgrades it might offer over its predecessor. The lineup is said to include the standard Vivo X300 and the Vivo X300 Pro, which might also support satellite communication. Expected to launch in China next month, the Pro model has reportedly been spotted on a certification website in China, revealing its supported charging speed.
title: Vivo X300 Pro Certification Indicates It Might Offer the Same Charging Speed as the Vivo X200 Pro

description: IO interactive presented a gameplay deep dive for its upcoming James Bond game, 007 First Light, at Sony's State of Play livestream on Wednesday. The developer showed off the first mission players will take on as Bond, detailing stealth, combat, and driving segments. 007 First Light will launch on March 27. 2026.
title: 007 First Light Gameplay Deep Dive Showcases Stealth and Shootouts; Launch Date Announced

description: Apple Koregaon Park has been opened as its first store in Pune, making it the fourth physical Apple Store in India after Mumbai, Delhi, and Bengaluru. The store showcases the full Apple lineup, including the iPhone 16 series, MacBooks, iPads, and other accessories. Staffed by 68 members from 11 states, it is claimed to run on 100 percent renewable energy and is said to be carbon-neutral. Services include personalised setup, Apple Trade In, financing options, and a dedicated pickup zone.
title: Apple Koregaon Park Opens Its Doors to Customers as First Apple Store in Pune

description: On Wednesday, Instagram launched its official app for iPad, ending a 15-year drought. The Meta-owned platform redesigned the app layout to bring Reels to the Home tab, highlighting that users prefer to watch video content on bigger screens. The app is now available to download on the App Store for iPadOS.
title: Instagram Launches an Optimised Version of Its App for iPad With a Reels-Focused Design

description: Redmi 15C 4G has been launched in select global markets. The handset is the successor to 2024's Redmi 14C. It is powered by a MediaTek Helio G81-Ultra chipset, coupled with up to 8GB of RAM. The handset sports an HD+ LCD screen with a 120Hz refresh rate. It packs a 6,000mAh battery with 33W wired fast charging support.
title: Redmi 15C 4G Launched With Helio G81-Ultra Chipset and 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo's ColorOS 16 update will launch in China in October 2025, which is nearly a year after ColorOS 15 landed on users' devices last year. An Oppo official stated that the update is being carefully refined, with user feedback playing a key role. Early leaks suggest smoother performance, refined animations, enhanced lockscreen customisation, and new AI-driven features, along with fixes for issues like battery drain, overheating, and notification bugs. The Find X9 series is expected to debut with ColorOS 16 pre-installed.
title: Oppo Reveals ColorOS 16 Release Timeline; Oppo Find X8 Series Expected to Get Android 16-Based Update First

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 and the Galaxy Z Flip 3 debuted over four years ago and ran Android 11 out of the box. The South Korean tech giant has now updated the list of phones that are eligible to receive the upcoming firmware updates with the latest security patches, which does not include the two foldable phones, which were launched in August 2021.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3, Galaxy Z Flip 3 Will No Longer Receive Monthly Security Updates

description: Apple is all set to host its 'Awe Dropping' event on September 9. While iPhone 17, new Apple Watch models, and AirPods Pro 3 are the expected announcements, the company may also surprise us with more products. Devices such as AirTag 2 and Apple Vision Pro 2 may debut, but are unlikely to be announced. Here are five such products that we don’t expect to see at Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event.
title: From AirTag 2 to Apple Vision Pro 2, Five Products Unlikely to Debut at Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ Event

description: Reliance Jio has surpassed 500 million consumers in India, while also marking its ninth anniversary. To commemorate these milestones, it introduced a Rs. 349 celebration plan for prepaid users with free vouchers worth Rs. 3,000. Customers will also be able to take advantage of an unlimited data weekend between September 5--7, along with a JioHome offer.
title: Jio Announces Rs. 349 Celebration Plan With Free JioHotstar, Zomato Gold, and More Vouchers to Mark 9th Anniversary

description: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked on September 4 could witness the launch of several new devices, including the Galaxy Tab S11 series and the Galaxy S25 FE. The Galaxy Event will be held at 3:00pm IST on Thursday, and will be livestreamed on both the company’s website and its YouTube channel. Here’s everything expected to be announced during the event.
title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked Event Today: How to Watch the Galaxy Event Livestream and What to Expect

description: Tecno Pova Slim 5G is set to be launched in India today, September 4. It is teased to be the “world’s slimmest 3D curved display 5G smartphone”, measuring 5.93mm in thickness. Ahead of its launch, the company has teased several details about the handset, while leaks have also given us an idea of what to expect in terms of specifications. Here's all we know about the Tecno Pova Slim 5G.
title: Tecno Pova Slim 5G Launching Today: Know Price in India, Features, Specifications and More
